column3: Everyone was disabled in the fight, and we failed to secure his majesty's body .
Another operation took place a few days later, but the body was already gone.
You failed the intrusion operation with a troop of that size.^It seems that your service will harm the plan of the Empire.
I am deeply ashamed of myself, sir.
His majesty is suspecting if any relationship exists between you and the rebels.
Your dismissal is his generous measure, considering your occupation as a priest in the past.^Do you understand?
